details.description: Anonymously report a vehicle on the public road that hasn't got a tax disc
details.more_information:
Before reporting a vehicle, check for free if it’s been taxed.

Reporting an untaxed vehicle to DVLA doesn’t mean it will be automatically wheelclamped. There are a number of actions that DVLA can take on untaxed vehicles.
details.introduction: If you see a vehicle on the public road with an out-of-date tax disc, you can report it anonymously to DVLA. Your report will be investigated and action taken, if needed.
details.alternate_methods:
You can’t report an untaxed vehicle by phone. Write to DVLA instead.


Enforcement Section, W070/D12
DVLA
Longview Road
Swansea
SA7 0XZ

Include the:

  • vehicle registration number
  • make, model and colour
  • detailed location
  • time the vehicle can be seen on the road if known
